sentences.en: a hand-crafted silver cigar case
sentences.cn: 手工制作的银雪茄盒

sentences.en: arts and crafts
sentences.cn: 手工艺

sentences.en: Craft Resources also sells yarn and embroidery floss.
sentences.cn: 工艺人员服务公司也售卖纱线和绣花丝线。

sentences.en: Each doll is crafted individually by specialists.
sentences.cn: 每个布娃娃都由专业人员手工制作

sentences.en: He acquired the craft of wood carving in his native town.
sentences.cn: 他在老家学会了木雕手艺.

sentences.en: He is the master who initiated me into the craft.
sentences.cn: 他是我的入门师傅.

sentences.en: He used a certain amount of craft to make the sale.
sentences.cn: 他为这次买卖使了些手腕.

sentences.en: He's a master of his craft.
sentences.cn: 他有一手好手艺.

sentences.en: It provides the thrust that makes the craft move forward.
sentences.cn: 它提供了飞机前进所需的推力。

sentences.en: Many girls do show an affinity for craft skills.
sentences.cn: 确实有许多女孩子喜爱手工.

sentences.en: My craft zipped across the bay.
sentences.cn: 我的小艇飞速驶过海湾。

sentences.en: The astronauts piloted their craft down to the lunar surface.
sentences.cn: 宇航员驾驶太空飞船在月球表面降落.

sentences.en: The engine of one landing craft was still running.
sentences.cn: 一艘登陆艇的发动机还在运转。

sentences.en: The frail craft rocked as he clambered in.
sentences.cn: 他爬进来的时候，那件易碎的工艺品摇晃起来。

sentences.en: The harbour is filled with craft.
sentences.cn: 海港充斥着许多船只.

sentences.en: The harbour was full of all kinds of craft.
sentences.cn: 港内泊满了各式各样的船只.

sentences.en: The harbour was full of pleasure craft.
sentences.cn: 港口满是游艇.

sentences.en: The musician spends years perfecting his craft.
sentences.cn: 这位音乐家多年来不断提高自己的艺术造诣。

sentences.en: traditional rural crafts
sentences.cn: 传统的乡村手工艺

sentences.en: Weaving was the town's chief craft.
sentences.cn: 纺织是该镇的主要行业.

phrases.tran_cn: 工艺美术设计；手工艺设计

trans.tran_cn: 手艺，技巧，手腕，船，飞行器
trans.tran_en: a job or activity in which you make things with your hands, and that you usually need skill to do
to make something using a special skill, especially with your hands
